original_title: Jean Seberg, Philippe Garrel et Les Hautes solitudes
overview: Jean Seberg, Philippe Garrel et Les Hautes solitudes is composed of excerpts from four of my films about Philippe Garrel which concern his silent masterpiece Les Hautes solitudes (1974) and its protagonist, the icon of the New Wave, Jean Seberg.
title: Jean Seberg, Philippe Garrel et Les Hautes solitudes
